entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as a person who has an ambition to become an Auror. He is also referred to as 'the Chosen One'. (Excerpt: 'Dolores Umbridge has told me that you cherish an ambition to become an Auror... The “Chosen One”, you know ...')

entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: Scrimgeour is mentioned as the Minister of Magic. He wants Harry Potter to give the impression that he is working for the Ministry. (Excerpt: 'Oh, well, nothing at all onerous, I assure you... If you were to be seen popping in and out of the Ministry from time to time...')

entities.name: gawain robards
entities.description: Gawain Robards is mentioned as Harry Potter's potential contact at the Auror Office. (Excerpt: 'And of course, while you were there, you would have ample opportunity to speak to Gawain Robards...')

entities.name: dolores umbridge
entities.description: Dolores Umbridge is mentioned as the person who told Scrimgeour about Harry Potter's ambition to become an Auror. She is also still at the Ministry. (Excerpt: 'Dolores Umbridge has told me that you cherish an ambition to become an Auror... Well, that could be arranged very easily ...')

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned as the organization where Scrimgeour wants Harry Potter to give the impression of working. (Excerpt: 'If you were to be seen popping in and out of the Ministry from time to time...')

entities.name: auror office
entities.description: The Auror Office is mentioned as the organization where Gawain Robards works. (Excerpt: 'And of course, while you were there, you would have ample opportunity to speak to Gawain Robards...')

relationships.description: Scrimgeour wants Harry Potter to give the impression that he is working for the Ministry. (Excerpt: 'Oh, well, nothing at all onerous, I assure you... If you were to be seen popping in and out of the Ministry from time to time...')
Scrimgeour has Gawain Robards as his successor at the Auror Office. (Excerpt: 'And of course, while you were there, you would have ample opportunity to speak to Gawain Robards...')
Dolores Umbridge has informed Scrimgeour about Harry Potter's ambition to become an Auror. (Excerpt: 'Dolores Umbridge has told me that you cherish an ambition to become an Auror...')
Harry Potter has Gawain Robards as his potential contact at the Auror Office. (Excerpt: 'And of course, while you were there, you would have ample opportunity to speak to Gawain Robards...')
